mapper.insert: insert into Device_DeadTrees_maintance (id, device_Id, serial, submit_date, batch, longitude, latitude, woodDiameter, woodHeight, woodVolume, KillMethod, Worker, Remarks, scanId, Pic, username, region ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deviceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{serial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{submitDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{batch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wooddiameter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{woodheight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{woodvolume,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{killmethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{worker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scanid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into Device_DeadTrees_maintance
id,
device_Id,
serial,
submit_date,
batch,
longitude,
latitude,
woodDiameter,
woodHeight,
woodVolume,
KillMethod,
Worker,
Remarks,
scanId,
Pic,
username,
region,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{deviceId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{serial,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{submitDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{batch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update: update device_deadtrees_maintance set device_Id=#{deviceId},serial=#{serial},submit_date=#{submitDate},batch=#{batch},longitude=#{longitude},latitude=#{latitude}, woodDiameter = #{wooddiameter},woodHeight = #{woodheight}, woodvolume = #{woodvolume},killmethod = #{killmethod}, worker = #{worker},remarks=#{remarks},scanid=#{scanid},pic=#{pic},username=#{username},region=#{region}, altitude=#{altitude},accuracy=#{accuracy} where id = #{id}

update device_deadtrees_maintance t1 left join device t2 on t2.id = t1.device_Id
t1.batch = #{batch},
killmethod = #{killmethod},
t1.latitude = #{latitude},
t1.longitude = #{longitude},
t1.region = #{region},
t1.serial = #{serial},
wooddiameter = #{wooddiameter},
submit_date = #{submitDate},
woodheight = #{woodheight},
t1.woodvolume = #{woodvolume},
t2.CustomTown = #{customTown},
t1.worker = #{worker},
where t1.id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Device_DeadTrees_maintance WHERE username = #{username} LIMIT #{num1},#{num2}
SELECT COUNT(Device_DeadTrees_maintance.id) FROM Device_DeadTrees_maintance left join device on device.id = device_Id where adcode = #{adcode};
SELECT * FROM Device_DeadTrees_maintance left join device on device.id = device_Id where adcode = #{adcode} LIMIT #{num1},#{num2};

select * from device where 1 = 1 and project = '枯死树采伐'
and adcode like '${adcode}%'
and town = #{town}
and (id = #{searchText} or province like concat('%', #{searchText}, '%') or city like concat('%', #{searchText}, '%') or area like concat('%', #{searchText}, '%') or town like concat('%', #{searchText}, '%'))
select * from device where manager = #{manager} AND project = '枯死树采伐'
select device.* from device left join device_map on device.id = device_map.device_id where user_id = #{worker} AND project = '枯死树采伐'
